properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 1:25PM EST until January 8 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4
to 8 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as
high as 35 mph may produce blowing and drifting snow.

* WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie
counties.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions
could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If
traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and
visibilities.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST WEDNESDAY
